Ingredients: ['1½ cups  (246 g)  cooked chickpeas', '½   bell pepper, minced', '¼   small red onion, minced', '⅓ cup  (80 mL)  vegan mayonnaise, or more to taste', '¼ cup  (36 g)  chopped pickles', '3 Tbsp  (27 g)  roasted sunflower seeds', '2 Tbsp  (2 g)  fresh dill, chopped', '1 Tbsp  (2 g)  fresh chives, chopped (optional)', '½   lemon, juiced (optional)', '1 pinch    salt, or more to taste', '1 pinch    ground black pepper, or more to taste', '6   slices multi-grain bread', '1   medium tomato, sliced', '6   butter lettuce leaves', '¼ cup  (51 g)  pickled red onions']
Directions: ['In a large bowl, mash the chickpeas with a potato masher or fork until flakey.', 'Add the remaining chickpea mash ingredients to the bowl and mix to combine.', 'Serve with your favourite sandwich fillings. Alternatively, serve as a snack with crackers, veggies, or scooped onto a salad. Enjoy!']

Title: Fresh Salad Rolls with a Creamy Peanut Hoisin Sauce
Ingredients: ['1.8 oz  (50 g)  dry white vermicelli noodles', '½ cup  (70 g)  frozen shelled edamame', '6   rice paper sheets', '1   avocado, thinly sliced', '2   red bell peppers, julienned', '1   carrot, julienned', '1 cup  (70 g)  shredded red cabbage', '½   cucumber, seeds removed, thinly sliced', '¼ cup  (60 mL)  peanut butter', '¼ cup  (60 mL)  hoisin sauce', '½   lime, juiced', '3 Tbsp  (45 mL)  water']
Directions: ['Add the rice noodles and edamame into separate bowls. Pour plenty of boiling water over each. Set aside for 5 minutes, then drain.', 'Meanwhile, add the sauce ingredients to a small bowl and mix. Add a bit more water if a thinner consistency is desired.', 'In a large shallow dish, soak 1 sheet of rice paper in lukewarm water for 5 seconds. The paper will continue to soften even after removed from the water. Avoid over-soaking to prevent tearing when rolling.', 'Let the excess water drip off the paper, then transfer the sheet to a large plate. In a line across the centre, add some rice noodles, edamame, and veggies.', 'Wrap the salad roll like you would a burrito: folding in the sides, then tucking and rolling. Cut in half using a sharp knife*.', 'Serve the rolls with the peanut sauce or with a sweet chili sauce, and enjoy!']

Title: Ranch Flavoured Roasted Chickpeas
Ingredients: ['1½ cups  (246 g)  cooked chickpeas', '2 tsp  (10 mL)  vegetable oil', '1 tsp  (1 g)  dried parsley', '1 tsp  (1 g)  nutritional yeast flakes', '½ tsp    dried chives', '¼ tsp    garlic powder', '¼ tsp    onion powder', '⅛ tsp    dried dill', '⅛ tsp    salt', '1 pinch    ground black pepper']
Directions: ['Preheat the oven to 390°F (200°C). Combine all the ingredients in a small bowl.', 'Spread the seasoned chickpeas onto a lined baking tray. Bake on the centre rack of the oven for 30 - 35 minutes*, or until golden. Mix once halfway.', 'Remove from oven and let cool. Enjoy on salads, soups, or snack away on them as-is. Enjoy!']

Title: Ranch Roasted Potato Wedges
Ingredients: ['3   medium potatoes', '1 Tbsp  (15 mL)  vegetable oil', '¾ tsp    dried parsley', '¾ tsp     nutritional yeast flakes', '½ tsp    dried chives', '¼ tsp    garlic powder', '¼ tsp    onion powder', '⅛ tsp    dried dill', '⅛ tsp    salt', '1 pinch    ground black pepper', 'sriracha mayo']
Directions: ['Preheat the oven to 390°F (200°C). Cut the potatoes in half lengthwise, then cut into wedges about ½ inch (1 cm) thick.', 'Transfer to a bowl. Add all the remaining ingredients and toss to coat.', 'Spread the potatoes out in a single layer* over one or two lined baking trays.', 'Bake for 30 - 40 minutes, or until golden. Give the potatoes a flip once at the halfway point. Enjoy!']

Title: Vegan Ranch Mayo Dip
Ingredients: ['½ cup  (120 mL)  vegan mayonnaise', '1 tsp  (1 g)  nutritional yeast flakes', '1 tsp  (1 g)  dried parsley', '¼ tsp    dried chives', '¼ tsp    garlic powder', '¼ tsp    onion powder', '⅛ tsp    dried dill', '⅛ tsp    salt', '1 pinch    ground black pepper', 'roasted potato wedges']
Directions: ['Combine all the ingredients in a bowl and stir until combined. Serve and enjoy!']

Title: 2-Minute Chocolate Nut Spread
Ingredients: ['½ cup  (120 mL)  almond butter', '2 Tbsp  (13 g)  Dutch processed cocoa powder', '2 Tbsp  (30 mL)  maple syrup', '2 Tbsp  (30 mL)  unsweetened soy milk']
Directions: ['Mix all the ingredients in a small bowl, and enjoy as a spread on toast, or as a dip for fresh fruit.']

Title: Frozen Yogurt Covered Blueberries
Ingredients: ['1 cup  (150 g)  fresh blueberries, washed, dried', '½ cup  (120 mL)  unsweetened soy yogurt†']
Directions: ['Gently mix the washed blueberries and yogurt together in a bowl.', 'Using a fork, drop the yogurt-covered berries one by one in a single layer* onto a parchment-lined baking tray. Place in the freezer for 30 - 60 minutes, or until the yogurt coating looks mostly frozen.', 'Peel the berries off the parchment paper and transfer them to an airtight container. Enjoy immediately, or return to the freezer to store until ready to enjoy.']

Title: Watermelon Pizza
Ingredients: ['½   watermelon', '1½ cups  (360 mL)  unsweetened coconut yogurt†', '1 cup  (150 g)  fresh mixed berries', 'roasted pumpkin seeds', 'fresh mint leaf', 'unsweetened toasted coconut flakes']
Directions: ['Wash the watermelon and cut into 1 inch (2 cm) thick rounds.', 'Top each round with a couple of scoops of yogurt, and spread it so that it almost reaches the rind.', 'Cut into slices and top with fruits and other desired toppings. Enjoy!']

Title: Roasted Potato Wedges
Ingredients: ['4   medium potatoes', '1 Tbsp  (15 mL)  vegetable oil', '¾ tsp    paprika powder', '½ tsp    onion powder', '½ tsp    garlic powder (optional)', '½ tsp    salt', '1 pinch    ground black pepper', 'ketchup', 'vegan ranch mayo dip', 'sriracha mayo']
Directions: ['Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). Cut the potatoes in half lengthwise, then cut into wedges about ½ inch (1 cm) thick.', 'Transfer the potatoes to a large bowl. Drizzle with the oil, paprika, onion powder, garlic powder, salt, and pepper and mix to coat.', "Spread the potatoes out in a single layer, ideally over two lined baking trays. Try to not overcrowd the tray, as this won't allow the potatoes to crispen up sufficiently in the oven.", 'Bake in the centre rack of the oven for 25 - 35 minutes, or until golden, stopping to give the potatoes a flip once halfway.', 'Serve with your favourite dip(s). Enjoy!']

Title: Rhubarb & Raspberry Almond Tart
Ingredients: ['13 oz  (375 g)  rhubarb stalks, cut into 1 cm pieces', '1 Tbsp  (14 g)  granulated sugar', '½ cup  (160 g)  raspberry jam', '5.6 oz  (160 g)  digestive cookies', '5   Medjool dates, pits removed', '3 Tbsp  (41 g)  refined coconut oil, melted', '1 tsp  (5 mL)  pure vanilla extract', '3 Tbsp  (21 g)  ground flaxseeds', '5 Tbsp  (75 mL)  unsweetened soy milk', '¾ cup  (72 g)  almond flour', '¼ cup  (56 g)  granulated sugar', '3 Tbsp  (42 g)  unsalted margarine', '2 Tbsp  (17 g)  all-purpose flour', '1 tsp  (5 mL)  pure vanilla extract', 'powdered sugar']
Directions: ['Preheat the oven the 350°F (180°C). Meanwhile, mix the flaxseeds and milk in a small bowl and set aside to gel.', 'Toss rhubarb pieces with sugar. Spread over a lined baking tray and roast for 10 minutes.', 'Blend the ingredients for the crust in a food processor. The mixture should hold together when pressed between your fingers.', 'Transfer the crust mixture to a 10-inch (22 cm) tart pan. Press firmly into the pan to create the crust.', 'In the now empty food processor, add the frangipane ingredients. Blend into a paste.', 'Spread the raspberry jam over the crust.', 'Dollop the frangipane over the jam layer and smooth out into an even layer.', 'Add the roasted rhubarb pieces to the top of the tart. Bake on the centre rack of the oven for 20 - 25 minutes, or until the crust turns golden along the edges.', 'Remove from the oven, and let cool before serving. Dust with powdered sugar if desired, and enjoy!']

Title: White Asparagus & Potato Soup
Ingredients: ['23 oz  (650 g)  white asparagus', '4 cups  (960 mL)  water', '2 tsp  (10 mL)  olive oil', '1   medium onion, chopped', '3   cloves garlic, minced', '2   medium potatoes, cut into 1 cm cubes', '2    vegetable bouillon cubes', '1 tsp  (2 g)  paprika powder', '1 pinch    ground black pepper', 'roasted unsalted hazelnuts', 'fresh chives', 'croutons']
Directions: ['Peel the outer layer of the asparagus with a vegetable peeler. Trim off the ends to remove any tough, woody bits.', 'Place the asparagus and water in a large pot on medium-high heat. Cook partially covered at a gentle simmer for 8 - 10 minutes.', 'Add the oil to a large pot on medium-high heat. When hot, add the onion, cooking until lightly golden.', 'Scoop out the cooked asparagus and transfer to a cutting board. Reserve the cooking liquid. Chop the asparagus into bite-sized pieces and reserve the tips for garnish.', 'Add the garlic and cook for another minute, until fragrant.', 'Add the remaining ingredients, including the asparagus and reserved water*. Cook partially covered for 15 minutes.', 'Once the potatoes are cooked through, use an immersion blender or standing blender to purée the soup.', 'Pour the hot soup into your desired bowls. Serve with the reserved asparagus tips and any desired garnish. Enjoy!']

Title: Frozen Yogurt Breakfast Bars
Ingredients: ['1 cup  (150 g)  frozen mixed berries', '1 cup  (178 g)  Medjool dates, pits removed', '2 cups  (204 g)  rolled oats', '1 cup  (240 mL)  almond butter', '¼ cup  (28 g)  ground flaxseeds', '1 tsp  (3 g)  ground cinnamon', '1½ cups  (360 mL)  unsweetened soy yogurt†']
Directions: ['Place the frozen berries in a saucepan on medium heat, stirring occasionally. The fruits will begin to thaw and release their juices. When heated through, remove from the heat.', 'In a food processor, blend the dates until smooth.', 'Add the oats, almond butter, ground flaxseed, and cinnamon. Blend again until well combined.', 'Transfer the mix to a lined 11 x 7 inch (18 x 28cm) baking dish and press firmly into the base of the dish. The more firmly you press, the better the bars will hold together.', 'Top with the yogurt and spread out evenly.', 'Dot the yogurt with the stewed berries and use a butter knife to swirl.', 'Place into the freezer and let freeze for 1 - 2 hours, or until the bars are solid enough to cut.', 'When removed from the freezer, cut into squares or bars of the desired size.', 'Let thaw for 3 - 5 minutes and enjoy!']

Title: Refreshing Ginger Mint Lemonade
Ingredients: ['1 Tbsp  (6 g)  freshly grated ginger', '20   fresh mint leaves, or more as desired', '3   lemons, juiced', '3 cups  (720 mL)  water', '2 cups  (222 g)  ice cubes', '2 Tbsp  (30 mL)  agave syrup, plus more to taste']
Directions: ['Gather the grated ginger into your hands and squeeze over a pitcher to extract the juice*. Discard the pulp. For a more subtle ginger flavour, simply cut the ginger into slices and add it to the pitcher, instead of grating and squeezing.', 'Add the mint to the pitcher, and use a wooden spatula or wooden tamper to give the mint a mash. We want to bruise the mint leaves slightly to extract their flavours.', 'Then add the lemon juice, water, ice cubes, and syrup. Stir, add more syrup if the drink tastes too tart, and serve immediately. Cheers!']

Title: Samosa Sweet Potato Breakfast Wraps with Tofu Scramble
Ingredients: ['2   medium sweet potatoes, cut into 2 cm cubes', '1 tsp  (5 mL)  vegetable oil', '¼ cup  (34 g)  frozen green peas', '½ tsp    ground cumin', '½ tsp    ground coriander (optional)', '½ tsp    ground turmeric', '½ tsp    dried fenugreek leaves (optional)', '1 pinch    salt', '1 pinch    ground black pepper', '1 tsp  (5 mL)  vegetable oil', '1   medium onion, diced', '11 oz  (325 g)  firm tofu, drained', '1 tsp  (3 g)  ground turmeric', '1 tsp  (1 g)  nutritional yeast flakes', '1 tsp  (3 g)  garlic powder', '1 pinch    salt, plus more to taste', '1 pinch    ground black pepper, plus more to taste', '3   large soft tortillas', '1   avocado, sliced', '1   bell pepper, sliced', '2 tsp  (10 mL)  hot sauce(optional)']
Directions: ['Steam the sweet potatoes in a medium pot using a steamer basket over high heat for 10-15 minutes, or until easily pierced with a fork.', 'Meanwhile, for the tofu scramble, heat the oil in a medium pan over medium heat. Add the onion and sauté until soft.', 'Gently squeeze out any excess water from the tofu, then crumble the tofu into the frying pan using your hands.', 'Then add the remaining tofu scramble ingredients. Cook for 3 - 5 minutes, or until everything is heated through. Transfer to a plate.', 'Return the now-empty pan to the stove. Add the cooked potatoes and oil. Panfry and mash the potatoes for 1 - 2 minutes.', 'Then add the remaining samosa sweet potato ingredients. Cook for 2 minutes, then transfer to a plate.', 'To assemble the wraps, add some potato filling and tofu scramble to the wrap. Top with avocado, and sliced peppers. Enjoy!']

Title: Baked Fruit Crumble - Three Ways
Ingredients: ['5 cups  (750 g)  frozen mixed berries', '1 cup  (102 g)  rolled oats', '2 Tbsp  (30 mL)  melted refined coconut oil†', '1 Tbsp  (14 g)  brown sugar', '1 tsp  (3 g)  ground cinnamon', 'chopped roasted pecans', 'vegan ice cream', 'unsweetened coconut yogurt']
Directions: ['Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F). If using larger berries, such as strawberries, first slice*. Divide into ramekins or place into a large baking dish.', 'Combine the oats, melted coconut oil, sugar, and cinnamon in a bowl. Spoon this over the fruit.', 'Bake on the middle rack of the oven for 10 - 15 minutes, or until the juices are bubbly, the fruit is tender, and the oatmeal is golden.', 'Remove from oven, let cool for a few minutes before serving. Top with yogurt, ice cream, or whip. Enjoy!']

Title: Tropical Coconut Popsicles
Ingredients: ['1⅔ cups  (399 mL)  canned full-fat coconut milk', '½ cup  (120 mL)  pineapple juice', '½   lime, juiced', '¾ cup  (112 g)  frozen raspberries']
Directions: ['To a medium bowl or large pitcher, add the coconut milk, pineapple juice, and lime juice. Mix.', 'Pour this mixture into popsicle moulds until each well is about 80% full*. Place the mould into the freezer for 1 - 2 hours.', 'Meanwhile, heat the frozen berries in a saucepan on medium heat for 3 - 5 minutes, or until fully thawed. Mash slightly to release some of the juices. Alternatively, thaw in the microwave. Set aside to cool.', 'After the 1 - 2 hours is up, remove the mold from the freezer and spoon the raspberry mixture onto the popsicles.', 'Use a popsicle stick to gently push the raspberries into the popsicle to create a swirl pattern. Then position the sticks in the center of the mould and return to the freezer*. Let freeze completely.', 'When you want to remove a popsicle, run the bottom of the mould under hot water to help release the popsicle. Enjoy!']

Title: Ultra Fudgy Sea Salt Caramel Brownies
Ingredients: ['2 cups  (356 g)  Medjool dates, pits removed', '2 Tbsp  (27 g)  refined coconut oil, melted†', '½ cup  (53 g)  Dutch processed cocoa powder', '1 Tbsp  (15 mL)  water', '½ cup  (55 g)  roasted unsalted pecans', '⅓ cup  (50 g)  chopped dairy-free dark chocolate', '1 pinch    flaked sea salt (optional)']
Directions: ['Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). In a food processor*, blend the dates, coconut oil, cocoa powder, and water until smooth.', 'Add the roasted pecans, chocolate, and a pinch of salt. Blend again, but let some chunks of pecans and chocolate remain.', 'Transfer the mixture into a parchment-lined 9 x 9 inch (21 x 21 cm) baking dish, and spread evenly. Bake for 10 minutes**.', 'When removed from the oven, top with some more crushed pecans, chopped chocolate, and a sprinkle of sea salt if desired. Gently press these in to secure them.', 'Let cool before cutting. These brownies are fudgiest if kept in the fridge. Enjoy!']

Title: Stewed Berries
Ingredients: ['½ cup  (75 g)  frozen raspberries', '½ cup  (75 g)  frozen blueberries']
Directions: ['Stovetop directions: place the frozen fruit in a saucepan on medium heat, stirring occasionally. The fruits will begin to thaw and release their juices. When heated through, remove from the heat.', 'Microwave directions: in a microwave-safe bowl, heat the frozen fruit at 600W for 1 minute, then stir. Return to the microwave and continue at 30-second increments. If desired, mash with a fork so more juices seep out but some chunks remain. Enjoy!']

Title: Homemade Almond Butter
Ingredients: ['3 cups  (429 g)  raw almonds']
Directions: ['Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). Place the almonds onto a baking tray, and toast in the oven for 7 - 10 minutes, stirring occasionally until lightly golden*.', 'Add the toasted almonds to a high-powered food processor** (ideally 600W or higher) and blend on high for 5 - 7 minutes until creamy.', "Continue to blend until smooth. Stopping too soon results in a thicker consistency. If your food processor isn't very powerful, you may need to blend it for an extra 5 minutes to achieve the desired consistency or consider adding a bit of oil to help the process along. Enjoy!"]

Title: Falafel Wraps with Roasted Garlic Mayo
Ingredients: ['1   head garlic, unpeeled', '1 tsp  (5 mL)  olive oil', '16   falafels', '¼ cup  (60 mL)  vegan mayonnaise, plus more to taste', '¾ cup  (184 g)  hummus', '4   pita breads', '8   romaine lettuce leaves', '2    medium tomatoes, sliced', '¼   cucumber, sliced', '¼ cup  (34 g)  black olives, sliced (optional)']
Directions: ['Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). Cut the top of a garlic and place it on a baking tray. Drizzle over the oil and roast for 15 minutes.', 'Add the falafels to the baking tray with the garlic and bake for another 5 minutes, or according to the package instructions.', 'When cool enough to handle, squeeze the garlic from the peel into a small bowl, and mash it with a fork. Then add the mayo and mix well.', 'Spread a generous amount of hummus and garlic mayo on the wrap. Add the falafel and veg, roll it up, and enjoy!']

Title: Perfect Roasted Garlic
Ingredients: ['1   head garlic', '2 tsp  (10 mL)  olive oil']
Directions: ['Preheat the oven to 390°F (200°C). Cut the top ½ cm off the top of a bulb of garlic to expose the cloves.', 'Transfer to a baking tray, and drizzle on the olive oil.', 'Roast in the centre rack of the oven for 20 - 25 minutes, or until they are lightly golden.', 'Remove from the oven and let cool. The garlic can be squeezed from the peel once cooled.']

Title: Roasted Garlic, Potato & Arugula Pizza
Ingredients: ['2   medium ready-made pizza crusts', '2 tsp  (10 mL)  olive oil', '8   roasted garlic cloves', '2   small potatoes', '1¼ tsp  (1 g)  dried thyme', '1 pinch    salt', '1 cup  (20 g)  arugula', '5   sun-dried tomatoes in oil, drained, chopped', '10   kalamata olives, pits removed, chopped', '3 Tbsp  (25 g)  roasted pine nuts', '1 Tbsp  (15 mL)  tahini', '1 Tbsp  (15 mL)  sriracha hot sauce', '1 Tbsp  (15 mL)  fresh lemon juice', '1 tsp  (5 mL)  maple syrup', 'homemade pizza dough']
Directions: ['Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). Place the pizza crust on a flat baking tray, and lightly coat with olive oil.', 'Place the roasted garlic onto the crust and mash it using the back of a fork, distributing it evenly over the crust.', 'For the potatoes to cook in the same amount of time it takes to cook the crust, be sure to slice the potatoes as thinly and evenly as possible. Layer the potatoes over the garlicky crust.', 'Sprinkle the thyme and salt over the pizza.', 'Bake on the centre rack of the oven for 13 - 15 minutes, or until the crust is golden and the potatoes are cooked through.', 'Meanwhile, combine the sauce ingredients in a small bowl.', 'Remove the pizza from the oven and top it with the arugula, sun-dried tomatoes, olives, and roasted pine nuts. Drizzle over the tahini sriracha sauce, and enjoy!']

Title: BTLT: BBQ Tempeh Lettuce & Tomato Sandwich
Ingredients: ['8.8 oz  (250 g)  tempeh', '½ cup  (120 mL)  barbecue sauce', '2 tsp  (10 mL)  vegetable oil, for frying', '6   slices whole wheat bread, toasted', '2 Tbsp  (30 mL)  vegan mayonnaise (optional)', '3   romaine lettuce leaves', '1   roasted red bell pepper from a jar, sliced', '1   medium tomato, sliced', '1   avocado, sliced']
Directions: ['Optional step: bring a medium pan of water to a boil. Cut the tempeh into ¼ inch (½ cm) thin strips. The thinner they are, the crispier they will be! Add the strips to the boiling water and cook for 5 minutes to reduce the bitterness. Drain and pat dry.', 'Mix the tempeh and BBQ sauce and let sit for at least 5 minutes, or ideally for 2 hours or overnight for maximum flavour.', 'Add the oil to a large pan on medium-high heat, and once heated, add the tempeh strips and cook until golden on both sides. Keep an eye on it as BBQ sauce can quickly burn. Remove from heat when crisped to your liking.', 'Top the toasted bread with mayo. Add the tempeh strips, lettuce, roasted pepper, tomatoes, and avocado. Enjoy!']

Title: To-Go Miso Noodle Soup
Ingredients: ['1.8 oz  (50 g)  quick-cooking ramen noodles', '2 Tbsp  (34 g)  miso paste', '½   vegetable bouillon cube', '2.8 oz  (80 g)  firm tofu, cut into 1 cm cubes', '3   button mushrooms, sliced', '1   stalk green onion, thinly sliced', '½ cup  (15 g)  fresh spinach', '1½ cups  (360 mL)  boiling water']
Directions: ['Layer your soup ingredients in a mason jar or another heat-proof container. Noodles should go at the bottom, followed by the miso and bouillon cube, then tofu*, green onion, and lastly the mushrooms and spinach. Keep sealed in the fridge until ready to eat.', 'When ready to enjoy, carefully pour boiling water into your jar**, plus more if needed to fully submerge all the ingredients. Or transfer the contents into a bowl and pour the water on top to cover.', 'Add a cover, let sit for about 3 - 5 minutes or until the noodles are cooked. Garnish and enjoy!']

Title: Thai Sweet Potato & Chickpea Green Curry
Ingredients: ['1 cup  (200 g)  uncooked white rice, rinsed', '½ Tbsp  (7 mL)  vegetable oil', '1   medium onion, diced', '2   cloves garlic, crushed', '2 Tbsp  (50 g)  Thai green curry paste', '1   medium sweet potato, cut into 1 cm cubes', '1⅔ cups  (399 mL)  canned full-fat coconut milk', '1¼ cups  (205 g)  cooked chickpeas', '⅓ cup  (80 mL)  water', '2 cups  (60 g)  fresh spinach']
Directions: ['Cook the rice according to the package instructions.', 'Add the oil and onion to a large pot on high heat. Cook for 3 minutes.', 'Add the garlic and sauté until fragrant, about 1 minute.', 'Add the curry paste, and mash into the garlic and onion mixture until fragrant, about 30 seconds.', 'Then add the sweet potato, coconut milk, chickpeas, and water*.', 'Bring to a boil, then reduce to a simmer. Cook for 10 - 15 minutes, partially covered, until the sweet potatoes are cooked.', 'Remove from heat and add the spinach, stirring to wilt.', 'Serve over rice or with naan, and enjoy!']

Title: Rainbow Veggie Sushi Rolls
Ingredients: ['1½ cups  (300 g)  uncooked Japanese short-grain rice', '2 Tbsp  (30 mL)  rice vinegar', '1 tsp  (5 g)  granulated sugar', '½ tsp    salt', '1   medium sweet potato, peeled, cut into ½ cm planks', '6   nori seaweed sheets', '1   avocado, sliced', '1   mango, sliced', '½   cucumber, seeds removed, thinly sliced', '1   red bell pepper, thinly sliced', 'sodium-reduced\xa0soy sauce', 'toasted sesame seeds', 'pickled ginger']
Directions: ['Rinse the rice until it runs clear. Cook the rice according to the package instructions. When cooked, remove from the heat and keep covered with a lid for 5 minutes.', 'In a small bowl, whisk together the vinegar, sugar, and salt.', 'Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). Lay the sweet potato planks on a baking tray and roast in the oven until cooked through, about 20 minutes, flipping halfway. Remove from oven and let cool before cutting into thin strips.', 'Transfer the cooked rice to a large shallow bowl. Pour over the sugar-vinegar mixture and gently mix it in while the rice is still warm. Then let the rice cool to room temperature.', 'Spoon some cooled rice on the rough side of a nori sheet and spread it out*. You should still be able to see some of the seaweed below the rice. Leave about 1 inch (2 cm) of space at the top of your sheet uncovered.', 'Place some veggies and mango strips in a line, about 1 cm above the bottom of your roll. Then roll it up! Wet the seaweed at the top of the roll with some water to help it secure the roll shut.', 'Use a sharp knife** to cut the rolls into bite-sized pieces. Enjoy!']

Title: Thai Red Curry Noodle Soup with Crispy Tofu
Ingredients: ['1 Tbsp  (15 mL)  vegetable oil', '11 oz  (325 g)  firm tofu, pressed, cut into 1 cm cubes', '1 tsp  (5 mL)  vegetable oil', '3   cloves garlic, minced', '1 Tbsp  (6 g)  freshly grated ginger', '3 Tbsp  (45 mL)  Thai red curry paste†', '2½ cups  (600 mL)  boiling water', '1⅔ cups  (399 mL)  canned full-fat coconut milk', '1   vegetable bouillon cube', '2 Tbsp  (30 mL)  sodium-reduced\xa0soy sauce', '2 tsp  (10 mL)  sambal oelek (optional)', '1   red bell pepper, thinly sliced', '4.4 oz  (125 g)  dry brown rice noodles', '2   heads of baby bok choy, ends trimmed', 'fresh basil', 'lime slice', 'fresh bean sprouts', 'sliced green onion']
Directions: ['Add the vegetable oil to a large pan on medium-high heat. When the oil is hot, add the tofu. Try to let sit undisturbed, stirring only every few minutes. Continue until lightly golden and crispy on all sides.', 'Meanwhile, to a large pot on high heat, add the oil, garlic, and ginger. Let cook for 2 minutes.', 'Add the curry paste and cook for 1 more minute, stirring throughout.', 'Then add the boiling water, coconut milk, bouillon cube, soy sauce, sambal, and bell pepper. Stir and partially cover. Let the soup simmer for 5 minutes.', 'Then add the noodles and greens and let simmer for 3 more minutes**.', 'Serve, add the tofu, and your desired garnish, and enjoy!']

Title: Tempeh Tacos with Cashew Lime Cream
Ingredients: ['2 tsp  (10 mL)  vegetable oil', '2   medium shallots, minced', '3   cloves garlic, minced', '11 oz  (300 g)  tempeh', '2 tsp  (5 g)  onion powder', '1 tsp  (2 g)  paprika powder', '1 tsp  (2 g)  ground cumin', '½ tsp    dried oregano', '½ tsp    chili powder, or less for less spicy (optional)', '⅛ tsp    ground black pepper', '1⅔ cups  (400 g)  canned diced tomatoes', '2 Tbsp  (30 mL)  sodium-reduced\xa0soy sauce', '9   small soft tortillas', '1 cup  (149 g)  cherry tomatoes, chopped', '1   avocado, sliced', '¼   small red onion, minced', '½ cup  (65 g)  raw cashews', '⅓ cup  (80 mL)  boiling water', '1   lime, juiced', 'fresh cilantro', 'lime slice']
Directions: ['To a large pan on high heat, add the oil, shallots, and garlic and sauté for 2 minutes.', 'Crumble the tempeh into the pan with your hands and cook for 6 - 7 minutes, stirring until lightly golden. Add splashes of water as needed to deglaze the pan.', 'Meanwhile, make the cashew cream by adding the ingredients to a small food processor. Blend until smooth. Add more water if needed to achieve your desired consistency.', 'Returning to the pan with the tempeh, add the spices and toast for 30 seconds. Then add the diced tomato and soy sauce, cooking for 3 - 5 minutes.', 'Meanwhile, heat the tortillas on a skillet. Spoon the tempeh it onto the warmed tortillas, top with tomatoes, avocado slices, and onions. Enjoy!']

Title: Speedy Pea & Basil Pesto Pasta
Ingredients: ['8.8 oz  (250 g)  dry linguine noodles', '1 tsp  (5 mL)  vegetable oil', '4   cloves garlic, minced', '2 tsp  (10 mL)  vegetable oil', '2   medium shallots, diced', '2   roasted red bell peppers from a jar, from a jar, diced', '1   lemon, juiced', '1½ cups  (218 g)  fresh green peas', '½ cup  (68 g)  roasted pine nuts', '1 cup  (24 g)  fresh basil', '2 Tbsp  (30 mL)  olive oil', '1 pinch    salt', '1 pinch    ground black pepper', '2 cups  (40 g)  arugula', 'fresh basil', 'roasted pine nuts', 'lemon slice']
Directions: ['Cook the pasta according to package instruction in salted boiling water until al dente.', 'Add the oil and garlic to a medium pan on high heat. Cook for 2 minutes, then transfer to a small food processor.', 'To the now-empty pan, add the oil and shallots. Cook until golden, adding the bell peppers at the end just to heat through.', 'Meanwhile, returning to the food processor, add in the lemon juice, peas, pine nuts, basil, olive oil, salt, and pepper. Blend until creamy.', 'When the pasta is al dente, drain, and transfer it back to the empty pot. Add the shallot mixture and pea pesto to the pasta, and toss to combine.', 'Plate with arugula, garnish, and enjoy!']

Title: Sugar-Free Fudgy Two-Bite Brownies
Ingredients: ['1 Tbsp  (7 g)  ground flaxseeds', '½ cup  (120 mL)  unsweetened soy milk', '¼ cup  (34 g)  roasted unsalted hazelnuts', '¾ cup  (134 g)  Medjool dates, pits removed', '⅓ cup  (35 g)  Dutch processed cocoa powder', '¼ cup  (60 mL)  almond butter', '1 tsp  (5 mL)  pure vanilla extract', '1 tsp  (1 g)  instant coffee granules (optional)', '¼ tsp    salt', '⅓ cup  (56 g)  dairy-free dark chocolate chips']
Directions: ['Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). In a large bowl, combine the ground flaxseeds and milk. Set aside.', 'In a food processor, add the roasted hazelnuts and dates and blend until smooth.', 'Transfer the mixture to the large bowl as well, and add all the remaining ingredients. Mix until well combined.', 'Line or oil a mini muffin tin, and spoon a tablespoon of batter into each well. Bake on the centre rack for 22 - 25 minutes or until the top is firm and a toothpick comes out clean.', 'Allow to cool for a couple of minutes before removing from the tin. Enjoy!']

Title: Quick Homemade Tahini
Ingredients: ['3 cups  (384 g)  raw sesame seeds']
Directions: ["Toast the sesame seeds in a large pan on medium heat until lightly golden*. Stir constantly. The seeds continue to 'cook' even when taken off the heat, so be careful not to over toast them.", 'Transfer the cooled toasted seeds to a food processor (ideally 600W or more) and blend for 5 - 7 minutes**.', 'The key to smooth and runny tahini is to give it time, so keep blending. Transfer to a container and enjoy!']

Title: Green Pea, Edamame & Mint Dip
Ingredients: ['1 cup  (134 g)  frozen green peas', '1 cup  (140 g)  frozen shelled edamame', '3 Tbsp  (45 mL)  water', '3 Tbsp  (45 mL)  tahini', '1 Tbsp  (15 mL)  olive oil', '½   lemon, juiced', '10   fresh mint leaves', '2   cloves garlic', '1 tsp  (2 g)  ground cumin', '½ tsp    salt', 'toasted sesame seeds', 'small raw radish', 'roasted pine nuts']
Directions: ['Cook the peas and edamame in a saucepan of boiling water for 3 minutes, or according to package instructions, then drain.', 'Place all the ingredients in a food processor and blend until creamy.', 'Taste test and adjust to your liking. Add more tahini for a creamier consistency. Add more lemon for more zest.', 'Plate, garnish, and enjoy!']

Title: Vibrant Roasted Beetroot Hummus
Ingredients: ['2   medium raw beets, peeled', '1½ cups  (246 g)  cooked chickpeas', '¼ cup  (60 mL)  water', '1   lemon, juiced', '2 Tbsp  (30 mL)  tahini', '1 Tbsp  (15 mL)  olive oil', '2   cloves garlic', '½ tsp    salt', 'black sesame seeds', 'alfalfa sprouts']
Directions: ['Preheat the oven to 390°F (200°C). Cut the beets into ½ inch (1 cm) slices and lay on a lined baking tray. Roast for 40 - 45 minutes, or until cooked through. Set aside to cool.', 'Add all the ingredients to a food processor and blend until smooth. Taste test and adjust to the lemon, tahini, olive oil, and salt to your liking.', 'Plate, garnish, and enjoy!']

Title: Golden Vegan Hot Chocolate
Ingredients: ['3 cups  (720 mL)  unsweetened soy milk†', '4   Medjool dates, pits removed', '3 Tbsp  (20 g)  Dutch processed cocoa powder', '1½ tsp  (4 g)  ground cinnamon', '½ tsp    ground turmeric', '½ tsp    pure vanilla extract', '1 pinch    ground nutmeg (optional)', '1 pinch    ground black pepper', 'vegan whipped cream', 'foamed milk', 'chocolate shavings']
Directions: ['Add all the ingredients to a blender*, and blend until smooth.', 'Transfer to a saucepan and bring to a gentle simmer over medium-high heat. Stir continuously to prevent scorching the milk.', 'When heated through, remove from heat, transfer into your desired cups and enjoy!']

Title: Zucchini Rolls with Vegan Ricotta Cheese
Ingredients: ['½ cup  (65 g)  raw cashews', '1   clove garlic', '¼ cup  (60 mL)  unsweetened soy milk', '½ Tbsp  (7 mL)  apple cider vinegar', '1 tsp  (1 g)  nutritional yeast flakes', '½ tsp    olive oil', '¼ tsp    onion powder', '1 pinch    salt', '1 pinch    ground black pepper', '1   zucchini', '3½ cups  (105 g)  fresh spinach', '1⅔ cups  (399 mL)  passata sauce†', '2   cloves garlic, crushed', '1 Tbsp  (16 g)  tomato paste', '2 tsp  (2 g)  nutritional yeast flakes', '1 tsp  (1 g)  dried oregano', '1 tsp  (1 g)  Italian spice mix', '½ tsp    curry powder (optional)', '1 pinch    ground black pepper', '1 Tbsp  (15 mL)  olive oil', '½ cup  (40 g)  panko breadcrumbs', '2 tsp  (2 g)  Italian spice mix', '1 tsp  (2 g)  paprika powder', '⅛ tsp    salt', 'fresh basil']
Directions: ['Soak the cashews in boiling water for 10 minutes to soften.', 'Meanwhile, use a vegetable peeler to peel the zucchini into long strips.', 'Add the spinach to a large pan on medium-high heat, stirring for 1 - 2 minutes. When wilted, set aside.', 'Drain the cashews and add them to a small food processor along with the remaining ricotta ingredients. Blend until smooth.', 'Heat the oil in a small pan over medium-high heat. Add the seasoned breadcrumb ingredients. Stir frequently for 4 - 5 minutes.', 'Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C). To a medium bowl, add the passata sauce, garlic, tomato paste, nutritional yeast, oregano, Italian spice, curry powder, and pepper. Mix.', 'Layer about ½ of the tomato sauce on the bottom of a 9 x 6 inch (23 cm x 15 cm) baking dish.', 'Place 1 strip of zucchini on a plate and spread a thin layer of ricotta along the length.', 'Place some wilted spinach on top, then roll it into a spiral. Place the rolls in the baking dish, and repeat with the remaining zucchini strips.', 'Top the rolls with the remaining tomato sauce and sprinkle the seasoned breadcrumbs over it all.', 'Bake on the middle rack of the oven for 20 - 25 minutes, or until the crumbs are golden and the sauce is bubbling. Garnish, and enjoy!']

Title: Creamy & Rich London Fog
Ingredients: ['2 cups  (480 mL)  unsweetened soy milk†', '2 tsp  (4 g)  loose Earl Grey tea leaves', '1 tsp  (5 mL)  maple syrup, or more to taste', '2   cinnamon sticks', '½ tsp    pure vanilla extract', 'ground cinnamon', 'foamed milk']
Directions: ['To a saucepan on medium heat, add the milk, tea, maple syrup, and cinnamon. Whisk continuously until the milk starts to simmer, then stir in the vanilla and remove from the heat.', 'Cover and allow to steep for 1 - 2 minutes further for a stronger tea flavour. Then strain the tea into mugs and enjoy!']

Title: One-Pot Lasagna Soup
Ingredients: ['1 Tbsp  (15 mL)  olive oil', '1   medium onion, diced', '3   cloves garlic, minced', '2 Tbsp  (33 g)  tomato paste', '2   vegetable bouillon cubes', '1 tsp  (1 g)  Italian spice mix', '1 tsp  (1 g)  dried oregano', '1 tsp  (2 g)  onion powder', '½ tsp    dried thyme', '¼ tsp    salt', '¼ tsp    ground black pepper', '1¾ cups  (198 g)  soy veggie ground', '2 cups  (140 g)  button mushrooms, diced', '3⅓ cups  (800 g)  canned diced tomatoes', '3 cups  (720 mL)  water', '2 tsp  (10 mL)  balsamic vinegar', '8   dry lasagna sheets, broken into bite-sized pieces', '2 cups  (60 g)  fresh spinach', 'chili flakes', 'fresh basil']
Directions: ['Heat the oil in a large pot over medium-high heat. Add the onion and sauté until lightly golden, about 5 minutes.', 'Add the garlic, tomato paste, bouillon, and spices and cook for an additional 1 - 2 minutes.', 'Add the veggie ground and mushrooms, cooking until much of the moisture from the mushrooms evaporates, about 5 minutes.', 'Add the diced tomatoes, water, and balsamic vinegar. Bring to a boil.', 'Then add the lasagna sheets. Cook for 8 - 10 minutes or until the noodles are al dente.', 'Stir in the spinach at the very end, and remove the pot from the heat. Garnish and enjoy!']

Title: Vegan Gado-Gado with Sun-Dried Tomatoes
Ingredients: ['1 Tbsp  (15 mL)  vegetable oil', '2   medium onions, diced', '4   cloves garlic, thinly sliced', '2 cups  (336 g)  mock "chicken" pieces, torn into shreds', '4 cups  (400 g)  green beans, ends trimmed, cut in half', '1 cup  (240 mL)  boiling water', '1 cup  (200 g)  uncooked white rice', '2   bell peppers, chopped', '⅓ cup  (50 g)  sun-dried tomatoes in oil, drained, chopped', '⅓ cup  (80 mL)  sodium-reduced\xa0soy sauce', '2 tsp  (10 mL)  sambal oelek (or more if you like the heat)', '½ cup  (120 mL)  peanut butter', '⅓ cup  (80 mL)  water', '1   clove garlic', '1 Tbsp  (15 mL)  sodium-reduced\xa0soy sauce', '½   lime, juiced', '1 tsp  (5 g)  brown sugar']
Directions: ['Add the oil, onion, and garlic to a sauté pan on high heat. Cook for 5 minutes.', 'Add the mock chicken pieces. Continue to cook until lightly golden, about 5 minutes. Then transfer to a bowl.', 'Add the green beans and boiling water to the now-empty pan. Cover with a lid and cook at a gentle simmer for 7 minutes.', 'Meanwhile, cook the rice according to the package instructions.', 'Add all the ingredients for the peanut sauce to a small food processor and blend until smooth*.', 'Add the bell pepper to the pan with green beans. Cover and cook for 5 more minutes. A bit of remaining water is fine, but drain any excess beyond 1- 2 Tbsp.', 'Add the onion and mock chicken mixture back into the pan, along with the sun-dried tomatoes, soy sauce, and sambal. Cook until heated through.', 'Serve with rice, top with the peanut sauce, and enjoy!']

Title: Fabulously Healthy Buckwheat Pancakes
Ingredients: ['2   ripe bananas', '1 Tbsp  (7 g)  ground flaxseeds', '1 cup  (240 mL)  unsweetened soy milk†', '1 cup  (142 g)  buckwheat flour', '1 tsp  (3 g)  baking powder', '1 tsp  (3 g)  ground cinnamon', '1 tsp  (5 mL)  pure vanilla extract', '¼ tsp    salt', '¼ tsp    pumpkin spice mix (optional)', '1 cup  (150 g)  fresh mixed berries', '3 Tbsp  (45 mL)  almond butter', 'maple syrup']
Directions: ['Mash the bananas in a large bowl.', 'Add all of the remaining ingredients and stir until well combined. If your batter seems too runny, let the mixture sit for 5 minutes to thicken slightly.', 'Preheat a non-stick large pan over medium heat, and add some oil. When hot, dollop about 2 Tbsp of batter into the pan, using the back of your spoon to shape the batter into round pancake shapes.', 'When lightly golden on the bottom, flip, and let cook on the other side.', 'Add desired toppings, and enjoy!']

Title: Creamy Coconut Paprika Zucchini Soup
Ingredients: ['1 Tbsp  (15 mL)  vegetable oil', '2   medium onions, diced', '2   cloves garlic, crushed', '2   vegetable bouillon cubes', '1   zucchini, chopped', '3   red bell peppers, chopped', '1 tsp  (2 g)  ground coriander', '¼ cup  (28 g)  sun-dried bell pepper in oil, drained', '2 cups  (480 mL)  water', '1⅔ cups  (399 mL)  canned full-fat coconut milk', 'croutons', 'super seed mix', 'fresh parsley']
Directions: ['Heat the oil in a large pot over medium-high heat. Add the onions and sauté until golden, about 5 minutes.', 'Add the garlic and bouillon cubes and stir until the cubes have dissolved and the garlic is fragrant, about 1 - 2 minutes.', 'Add the zucchini, bell peppers, coriander, and sun-dried bell pepper. Cook for 4 - 5 minutes.', 'Add the water, and bring everything to a boil, then reduce to a simmer and partially cover with a lid. Cook for 10 - 15 minutes.', 'Add the coconut milk, let it heat through, then purée the soup with an immersion blender or standing blender until creamy.', 'Serve, garnish, and enjoy!']

Title: Herby Garlic Cream "Cheese"
Ingredients: ['¾ cup  (98 g)  raw cashews†', '11 oz  (325 g)  firm tofu, pressed', '2   cloves garlic', '½   lemon, juiced', '1 Tbsp  (15 mL)  apple cider vinegar', '2 tsp  (6 g)  garlic powder', '2 tsp  (5 g)  onion powder', '1 tsp  (6 g)  salt', '½ tsp    ground black pepper', '⅓ cup  (11 g)  fresh chives', '⅓ cup  (5 g)  fresh dill', '3 Tbsp  (4 g)  fresh basil, sliced']
Directions: ['Place the cashews in a heat-proof bowl and soak in boiling water for at least 1 hour, or overnight.', 'Drain the cashews and add to a blender or food processor, along with the tofu, garlic, lemon juice, vinegar, and spices. Blend until smooth.', 'Transfer to a bowl and fold in the herbs.', 'Optionally, place the spread in the fridge for an hour to set and for the flavours to meld.', 'Enjoy on your favourite toast or bagel with desired toppings. Enjoy!']

Title: Nourishing Coconut Milk Oatmeal
Ingredients: ['1 cup  (160 g)  steel cut oats, soaked overnight, drained', '1⅔ cups  (399 mL)  canned light coconut milk', '1 cup  (240 mL)  unsweetened soy milk†', '1   banana, sliced', '1 Tbsp  (7 g)  ground flaxseeds', '½ tsp    ground cinnamon', '1 tsp  (5 mL)  pure vanilla extract', '1 cup  (150 g)  fresh mixed berries', '3 Tbsp  (21 g)  roasted unsalted pecans', '1 Tbsp  (10 g)  hemp seeds (optional)']
Directions: ['To a saucepan, add the oats, coconut milk, plant milk, banana, flaxseeds, and cinnamon. Bring to a boil, reduce to a gentle simmer and allow to cook for 15 minutes*, stirring occasionally.', 'Add more milk if a thinner consistency is preferred, or cook for another couple of minutes to thicken. Stir in the vanilla and remove it from the heat.', 'Add your favourite toppings, and enjoy!']

Title: Hazelnut Granola Breakfast Bars
Ingredients: ['2 Tbsp  (14 g)  ground flaxseeds', '6 Tbsp  (90 mL)  water', '1 cup  (135 g)  roasted unsalted hazelnuts', '1¼ cups  (128 g)  rolled oats, for blending', '1 tsp  (3 g)  ground cinnamon', '½ tsp    salt', '1¼ cups  (128 g)  rolled oats, remaining whole', '¾ cup  (134 g)  Medjool dates, pits removed', '½ cup  (120 mL)  almond butter', '⅓ cup  (73 g)  refined coconut oil, soft or melted†', '1 tsp  (5 mL)  pure vanilla extract', '½ cup  (80 g)  dried cranberries, chopped', '¼ cup  (36 g)  raw pumpkin seeds', '¼ cup  (25 g)  raw pecans', '1.4 oz  (40 g)  dairy-free dark chocolate, chopped', '2 Tbsp  (10 g)  unsweetened coconut flakes (optional)']
Directions: ['Add the ground flaxseeds and water to a small bowl. Mix and sit aside.', 'Line or lightly grease a 9 x 13 inch (18 x 27 cm) baking dish. Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C).', 'Add the hazelnuts, oats, cinnamon, and salt to a food processor. Blend into a flour.', 'Transfer to a large bowl and add the remaining whole oats to the bowl as well.', 'Add the dates to the now-empty food processor. Blend until a paste is formed.', 'Then add the almond butter, coconut oil, vanilla extract, and gelled flaxseeds. Blend until well combined.', 'Transfer the sticky mixture from the food processor into the large bowl with the dry ingredients. Add the cranberries, pumpkin seeds, pecans, and chocolate to the bowl as well. Mix well.', 'Transfer the mixture to the baking dish, and press down firmly to smooth out the top. If desired, press on any of the optional toppings, like coconut flakes or more nuts or dried fruit.', 'Bake on the centre rack of the oven until lightly golden, about 14 - 17 minutes. Let cool completely before cutting into bars. Enjoy!']

Title: The BEST Double Chocolate Brownies
Ingredients: ['2 Tbsp  (14 g)  ground flaxseeds', '¼ cup  (60 mL)  water', '2.6 oz  (75 g)  dairy-free dark chocolate, for melting', '¼ cup  (54 g)  refined coconut oil†', '½ cup  (112 g)  granulated sugar', '¼ cup  (55 g)  brown sugar, packed', '¼ cup  (60 mL)  unsweetened soy milk', '1 tsp  (5 mL)  pure vanilla extract', '¾ cup   (104 g)  all-purpose flour', '½ cup  (53 g)  Dutch processed cocoa powder', '1 tsp  (3 g)  baking powder', '¼ tsp    salt', '2.6 oz  (75 g)  dairy-free dark chocolate, chopped']
Directions: ['Mix the ground flaxseed and water in a large bowl. Let sit for 5 minutes to gel.', 'Meanwhile, fill a saucepan 2-inch (5 cm) full with water. Bring to a simmer, and place a heat-proof bowl on the saucepan. Roughly chop the chocolate for melting and add to the bowl with the oil.', 'Stir until fully melted*. Then remove from the heat and let cool off slightly. Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C).', 'Transfer the melted chocolate to the large bowl containing the flaxseeds. Add the sugars, milk, and vanilla, and mix well.', 'Next, add the flour, cocoa powder, baking powder, and salt. Mix until partly combined, then stir in the chopped chocolate until just combined. Be careful not to over-mix.', 'Transfer the mixture to a parchment-lined 6 x 6 inch (15 x 15 cm) baking dish and bake in the oven for 17 - 20 minutes. The brownie will not have completely set by then, making it deliciously fudgy.', 'Let the brownie cool off completely, then transfer it to the fridge to firm up more if desired*. Enjoy!']

Title: Garden Chickpea Dill Dip
Ingredients: ['1 cup  (164 g)  cooked chickpeas', '1 cup  (198 g)  cooked red lentils', '1   celery stalk, minced', '1   carrot, grated', '½   lemon, juiced', '¼   red bell pepper, minced', '½   small red onion, minced', '3 Tbsp  (3 g)  fresh dill, minced', '3 Tbsp  (45 mL)  vegan mayonnaise', '3 Tbsp  (27 g)  chopped pickles', '2 Tbsp  (18 g)  roasted sunflower seeds', '1 tsp  (3 g)  capers, chopped', '½ tsp    dijon mustard', '¼ tsp    salt', '1 pinch    ground black pepper']
Directions: ['Add the chickpeas to a large bowl and mash with a fork. Add the remaining ingredients to the bowl and mix, mashing slightly.', 'Chill before serving, if possible, to allow the flavours to infuse. Enjoy!']

Title: Pistachio & Cranberry Energy Balls
Ingredients: ['1 cup  (178 g)  Medjool dates, pits removed', '2 Tbsp  (14 g)  ground flaxseeds', '3 Tbsp  (45 mL)  water', '1 cup  (102 g)  rolled oats', '½ cup  (62 g)  raw pistachios', '½ cup  (65 g)  raw cashews', '⅓ cup  (53 g)  dried cranberries', '¼ cup  (42 g)  dairy-free dark chocolate chips', '2 Tbsp  (30 mL)  maple syrup', '1 tsp  (5 mL)  pure vanilla extract', '¼ tsp    ground cinnamon (optional)', '1 pinch    salt']
Directions: ['Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). In a large bowl, mash the dates with a fork until smooth. Alternatively, you could use a food processor.', 'Then add the ground flaxseeds and water. Let sit for 5 minutes to gel.', 'Add the rolled oats and nuts (if not pre-roasted) to a baking tray and roast in the oven for 8 - 10 minutes, or until lightly golden, stirring once halfway.', 'Remove the oats and nuts from the oven and let cool. Then finely chop. Alternatively, pulse a few times in a food processor.', 'To the large bowl with the dates, add the chopped oats and nuts, cranberries, chocolate, maple syrup, vanilla, cinnamon, and salt. Mix well.', 'Roll into bite-size balls. Wetting your hand with a bit of water may help to prevent sticking. Enjoy!']

Title: Vegan Caramel Popcorn
Ingredients: ['2 tsp  (9 g)  refined coconut oil†', '½ cup  (96 g)  popcorn kernels', '1 Tbsp  (14 g)  refined coconut oil, melted', '3 Tbsp  (45 mL)  maple syrup', '2 tsp  (10 mL)  pure vanilla extract', '¼ tsp    baking soda', '⅛ tsp    ground cinnamon', '1 pinch    salt']
Directions: ['Heat the oil in a heavy-bottomed large pot on high heat. Add the popcorn kernels, stir, and cover. Shake every 15 seconds until popping starts. Then reduce the heat to medium-high and shake until the popping slows. Remove from heat, and keep the lid on until popping stops.', 'To make the caramel sauce, add the coconut oil and maple syrup to a small pan on medium-high heat. Simmer for 2 minutes, stirring throughout.', 'Then turn off the heat* and stir in the remaining caramel sauce ingredients.', 'Drizzle the caramel sauce over the popcorn and toss to coat. Spread out the popcorn onto parchment paper and let sit for 5 minutes to harden as it cools. Enjoy!']

Title: Classic Comforting Oatmeal
Ingredients: ['1 cup  (102 g)  rolled oats', '2 cups  (480 mL)  unsweetened soy milk†', '¾ tsp    ground cinnamon', '⅛ tsp    pumpkin spice mix (optional)', '2   bananas, sliced', '2 Tbsp  (14 g)  ground flaxseeds', '½ tsp    pure vanilla extract', '½ cup  (75 g)  stewed berries', '2 Tbsp  (30 mL)  peanut butter', '1 Tbsp  (10 g)  hemp seeds', '2 Tbsp  (18 g)  raw pumpkin seeds']
Directions: ['To a saucepan, add the oats, milk, cinnamon, pumpkin spice, and one of the bananas*. Cook at a gentle simmer for 5 minutes, stirring often.', 'Add the other banana and the flaxseeds, cooking for 3 - 5 minute longers. Add more milk for a thinner consistency, or cook for a few more minutes for a thicker porridge.', 'Remove the saucepan from the heat. Stir in the vanilla, plate, add desired toppings, and enjoy!']

Title: One-Bowl Chewy Double Chocolate Chip Cookies
Ingredients: ['½ cup  (109 g)  refined coconut oil, solid, packed†', '⅔ cup  (147 g)  brown sugar, packed', '½ cup  (120 mL)  unsweetened soy milk', '⅓ cup  (35 g)  Dutch processed cocoa powder', '3 Tbsp  (45 mL)  maple syrup', '1 Tbsp  (15 mL)  pure vanilla extract', '1 tsp  (3 g)  baking powder', '¾ tsp    baking soda', '½ tsp    instant coffee granules (optional)', '½ tsp    salt', '2 cups  (276 g)  all-purpose flour', '5.3 oz  (150 g)  dairy-free dark chocolate, chopped (plus extra for decoration if desired)']
Directions: ['In a large bowl, cream together the coconut oil and brown sugar using a fork.', "Then add the milk, cocoa powder, maple syrup, vanilla, baking powder, baking soda, instant coffee, and salt. Mix well. The mixture might look a bit clumpy, and that's okay*.", 'Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). Add the flour to the bowl and stir until just combined. Careful to not over-mix.', 'Then gently fold in the chopped chocolate.', 'Form little balls out of the dough and evenly distribute, about 2 inches (5 cm) apart, on a lined baking tray.', 'To decorate, add a few bits of chopped chocolate to the top of each cookie. Bake on the middle rack of the oven for 12 - 14 minutes.', 'Let cool on the tray for a bit before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely. Enjoy!']

Title: Candied Coconut & Cinnamon Pecans
Ingredients: ['2 Tbsp  (30 mL)  maple syrup', '2 Tbsp  (9 g)  unsweetened shredded coconut', '1 Tbsp  (14 g)  refined coconut oil , melted†', '¼ tsp    salt', '⅛ tsp     ground cinnamon', '2 cups  (198 g)  raw pecans']
Directions: ['Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). To a medium bowl, add all of the ingredients, except for the pecans. Mix well.', 'Then add in the pecans and toss to coat. Transfer to a lined baking tray and spread them out.', 'Bake in the middle rack of the oven for 7 - 8 minutes, stirring once halfway. The nuts continue to cook even after being taken out of the oven, so be careful not to overcook. The nuts continue to harden as they cool. Enjoy!']

Title: Comforting Coconut Red Lentil Daal
Ingredients: ['1 Tbsp  (15 mL)  vegetable oil', '1   medium onion, chopped', '3   cloves garlic, minced', '1   carrot, finely chopped', '1 Tbsp  (6 g)  freshly grated ginger', '2 tsp  (4 g)  curry powder', '1 tsp  (3 g)  ground turmeric', '1 tsp  (2 g)  ground cumin', '½ tsp    paprika powder', '1 pinch    salt, to taste', '2 cups  (384 g)  dry red lentils, soaked for 2 hours, drained', '2 cups  (480 mL)  water', '1   vegetable bouillon cube', '1⅔ cups  (399 mL)  canned full-fat coconut milk', '1½ cups   (300 g)  uncooked basmati rice, soaked for 2 hours, drained †', '2¼ cups  (540 mL)  water', '6   cardamom pods, cracked', 'fresh cilantro', 'unsweetened coconut yogurt']
Directions: ['Add the oil, onion, and garlic to a sauté pan on medium-high heat. Cook for 4 minutes.', 'Add the carrot and ginger, and cook for another 2 minutes.', 'Then add all of the spices. Stir for 30 - 60 seconds to toast the spices.', 'Then add the lentils, water, and bouillon. Cover, and cook at a simmer for 15 minutes.', 'Meanwhile, add the rice, water, and cardamom to a medium pot. Simmer covered for 13 minutes until cooked. Then remove from the heat and cover with a lid until ready to serve.', 'Add the coconut milk and cook until heated through.', 'Serve the rice alongside the daal. Garnish as desired. Enjoy!']

Title: Thick Dark Chocolate Pudding
Ingredients: ['8.8 oz  (250 g)  dairy-free dark chocolate, roughly chopped', '11 oz  (300 g)  silken tofu', '2 Tbsp  (30 mL)  maple syrup', '2 Tbsp  (30 mL)  almond butter', '1 tsp  (5 mL)  pure vanilla extract', '¼ tsp    salt', '½ tsp    instant coffee granules (optional)', 'fresh mixed berries']
Directions: ['Place the chocolate in a heatproof bowl and microwave at 600W. Stop to stir every 15 seconds until fully melted. Alternatively, melt in a double boiler over the stove. Set aside to cool slightly.', 'In a food processor or blender, combine all of the ingredients, except for the chocolate, and blend until smooth.', 'Then add the melted chocolate and continue blending until fully combined.', 'Pour into serving cups and refrigerate for about 30 minutes or until firm.', 'Garnish as desired just before serving. Enjoy!']

Title: Vegan Tofu Chorizo
Ingredients: ['1 Tbsp  (15 mL)  vegetable oil', '1   small onion, chopped', '4   cloves garlic, minced', '½ tsp    salt', '10   cremini mushrooms, finely chopped (optional)', '21 oz  (600 g)  firm tofu, pressed', '1 Tbsp  (3 g)  dried oregano', '1 Tbsp  (7 g)  paprika powder', '1 tsp  (3 g)  chili powder (optional)', '½ tsp    ground coriander (optional)', '½ tsp    ground cumin', '½ tsp    ground black pepper', '⅛ tsp    ground cinnamon (optional)', '2 Tbsp  (30 mL)  apple cider vinegar', '1 tsp  (5 mL)  sodium-reduced\xa0soy sauce']
Directions: ['Add the oil to a large pan on high heat. When hot, add the onion, garlic, and salt, and cook for 3 minutes.', 'Then add the mushrooms and cook until the mushrooms release their moisture and begin to brown, about 7 minutes.', 'Reduce the heat to medium-high. Crumble in the tofu with your hands. Cook, stirring and scraping the bottom of the pan to avoid burning until the tofu browns and crisps to your liking, around 15 - 20 minutes.', 'Add in the spices and continue to cook and scrape until fragrant, about 1 - 2 minutes. Lastly, add the vinegar and soy sauce, stir, and enjoy!']

Title: Soba Noodle Bowl with BBQ Tempeh
Ingredients: ['8.8 oz  (250 g)  tempeh, thinly sliced', '1 cup  (240 mL)  barbecue sauce', '3 Tbsp  (45 mL)  sodium-reduced\xa0soy sauce', '2 Tbsp  (30 mL)  tahini', '1   clove garlic, crushed', '½   lime, juiced', '1 Tbsp  (15 mL)  rice vinegar', '1 Tbsp  (15 mL)  agave syrup', '1 tsp  (2 g)  freshly grated ginger', '1 tsp  (5 mL)  sambal oelek (optional)', '1 tsp  (5 mL)  sesame oil', '6.3 oz  (180 g)  dry soba noodles', '1 cup  (140 g)  frozen shelled edamame', '1 Tbsp  (15 mL)  sesame oil', '2   cloves garlic, crushed', '1   carrot, julienned', '3.5 oz  (100 g)  shiitake mushrooms, thinly sliced', '1   large broccoli, cut into bite-sized pieces', 'toasted sesame seeds', 'red hot chili pepper', 'sliced green onion']
Directions: ['Lightly boil or use a steamer basket to steam the tempeh in a large pan on the stove for 10 minutes. This is an optional step, but can remove bitterness, and helps the tempeh soak up more marinade. Then rinse and pat dry.', 'Arrange the tempeh in a baking dish, pour on the BBQ sauce, and stir to coat. Cover and refrigerate for 2 to 24 hours - the longer the better.', 'Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). Place the marinated tempeh on a parchment-lined baking tray, and bake for 15 minutes. Then flip the pieces over and bake for another 10 minutes. Remove from oven and brush with additional BBQ sauce if desired.', 'Meanwhile, add all of the dressing ingredients to a bowl and whisk.', 'Add the soba noodles and edamame to a pot of boiling water. Return to a soft boil and cook for 5 minutes, or until the noodles are al dente*. Drain and rinse.', 'Heat a large pan on medium-high heat. When hot, add the oil and garlic and sauté for 2 minutes. Add the carrot and mushrooms and sauté for 5 minutes.', 'Then add the broccoli and cook for an additional 2 minutes. Add the drained noodles and edamame to the pan. Pour over the dressing and toss to combine. Divide into bowls, add the BBQ tempeh, garnish, and enjoy.']

Title: Protein-Packed Lentil & Quinoa Salad
Ingredients: ['¾ cup  (128 g)  uncooked quinoa', '1 cup  (100 g)  frozen shelled edamame beans', '2½ cups  (495 g)  cooked brown lentils', '1   red bell pepper, chopped', '3 cups  (90 g)  fresh spinach', '2 Tbsp  (18 g)  roasted pumpkin seeds (optional)', '¼ cup  (60 mL)  tahini', '¼ cup  (60 mL)  water', '2 Tbsp  (30 mL)  sodium-reduced\xa0soy sauce', '2 tsp  (10 mL)  apple cider vinegar', '1 tsp  (6 g)  miso paste', '1 tsp  (2 g)  onion powder', '1 tsp  (5 mL)  sambal oelek']
Directions: ['Cook the quinoa according to the package instructions.', 'Soak the edamame in hot water while working through the remaining steps.', 'Mix all of the dressing ingredients in a bowl until creamy.', 'Drain the edamame and add all of the salad ingredients to a large bowl and toss to combine.', 'Mix in the salad dressing when ready to serve, toss to combine, and enjoy!']

Title: Ciabatta Pizza with Tahini Balsamic Drizzle
Ingredients: ['1 cup  (240 mL)  passata sauce†', '¼ cup  (66 g)  tomato paste', '2   cloves garlic, crushed', '1 Tbsp  (2 g)  nutritional yeast flakes', '1 tsp  (1 g)  dried oregano', '1 tsp  (1 g)  Italian spice mix', '1 pinch    ground black pepper', '1   large ciabatta loaf', '12   kalamata olives, halved', '10   cherry tomatoes, halved', '4   button mushrooms, thinly sliced', '½   red bell pepper, thinly sliced', '¼   small red onion, thinly sliced', '1   arugula', '2 Tbsp  (30 mL)  tahini', '2 Tbsp  (30 mL)  water', '2 tsp  (10 mL)  balsamic vinegar']
Directions: ['Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). In a medium bowl, mix together the pizza sauce ingredients.', 'Slice the ciabatta open and place it on a baking tray. Spread this sauce onto the bread.', 'Arrange the veggies, except for the arugula, on top. Bake for 20 - 25 minutes, or until the vegetables are cooked to your liking.', 'Meanwhile, combine the tahini, water, and balsamic in a small bowl.', 'Drizzle the tahini sauce over the cooked pizza, top with arugula, slice, and enjoy!']

Title: Tropical Matcha Green Smoothie
Ingredients: ['1½ cups  (360 mL)  canned light coconut milk', '1 cup  (240 mL)  unsweetened soy milk†', '2   frozen bananas', '1 cup  (165 g)  fresh pineapples, chopped', '1 cup  (30 g)  fresh spinach', '4   Medjool dates, pits removed', '2 Tbsp  (20 g)  hemp seeds', '1½ tsp  (3 g)  matcha powder', 'fresh mixed berries', 'unsweetened toasted coconut flakes']
Directions: ['Blend all of the ingredients in a high-speed blender until well smooth.', 'Serve in a tall glass or a bowl with desired toppings. Enjoy!']

Title: Orange Ginger Sunrise Smoothie
Ingredients: ['1   orange, peeled', '1   carrot, peeled, roughly chopped', '¾ cup  (112 g)  frozen mango chunks', '½ cup  (75 g)  frozen raspberries', '¾ cup  (180 mL)  unsweetened soy milk†', '½ cup  (120 mL)  unsweetened soy yogurt', '1 Tbsp  (6 g)  fresh ginger', '2 Tbsp  (20 g)  hemp seeds (optional)']
Directions: ['Combine all of the ingredients in a high-speed blender and blend on high until smooth. Enjoy!']

Title: Coconut Matcha Latte
Ingredients: ['4   Medjool dates, pits removed', '1½ cups   (360 mL)  canned light coconut milk', '½ cup  (120 mL)  unsweetened soy milk†', '1 tsp  (2 g)  matcha powder']
Directions: ['Add all of the ingredients to a high-speed blender and blend until smooth*.', 'Transfer the mixture to a saucepan on medium-high heat and stir continuously.', 'When hot, but not boiling*, remove from heat and pour into your desired cups. Enjoy!']

Title: Massaged Umami Kale Salad
Ingredients: ['6 cups  (150 g)  kale, chopped', '2 tsp  (10 mL)  sesame oil', '¼ cup  (40 g)  dried cranberries', '3 Tbsp  (27 g)  roasted pumpkin seeds', '3 Tbsp  (20 g)  slivered toasted almonds', '1   small shallot, finely minced', '1   clove garlic, crushed', '½   lemon, juiced', '2 Tbsp  (30 mL)  Asian sesame paste', '1 Tbsp  (15 mL)  sodium-reduced\xa0soy sauce', '½ Tbsp  (7 mL)  maple syrup', '½ Tbsp  (7 mL)  rice vinegar', '½ tsp    miso paste', '1 pinch    ground black pepper']
Directions: ['Wash the kale and dry well*.', 'Place the kale in a large bowl and massage the sesame oil into the leaves with your hands for 1 - 2 minutes. This helps to soften the stiff leaves.', 'In a separate small bowl, mix together the dressing ingredients.', 'Pour the dressing over the kale, and toss to coat.', 'Toss in the add-ins. Enjoy!']

Title: Chocolate Hazelnut & Fig Granola
Ingredients: ['4 cups  (408 g)  rolled oats', '¾ cup  (101 g)  raw hazelnuts, coarsely chopped', '¼ cup  (36 g)  raw pumpkin seeds', '¼ cup  (55 g)  brown sugar, packed', '¼ cup  (60 mL)  vegetable oil', '¼ cup  (60 mL)  agave syrup', '¼ tsp    salt', '½ cup  (74 g)  dried figs, thinly sliced', '1.8 oz  (50 g)  dairy-free dark chocolate, chopped', '2 Tbsp  (21 g)  whole chia seeds']
Directions: ['Preheat the oven to 320°F (160°C). In a large bowl, mix together all the dry ingredients.', 'In a small bowl, which together the oil, agave syrup, and salt until very well combined.', 'Pour this wet mixture over the dry ingredients and toss to coat.', 'Evenly distribute over a large lined baking tray.', 'Bake on the centre rack of the oven for 20 - 25 minutes, or until lightly golden, stirring once or twice throughout. Once cooled, stir in the add-ins.', 'Transfer to an airtight container or large glass storage jar. Enjoy!']

Title: Deconstructed Sushi Bowl with Sweet Sesame Dressing
Ingredients: ['1½ cups  (285 g)  uncooked brown rice, soaked overnight, drained †', '2¼ cups  (540 mL)  water', '1   mango, chopped', '1   avocado, chopped', '¼   cucumber, chopped', '1 cup  (70 g)  shredded red cabbage (optional)', '½   small red onion, minced (optional)', '1½ cups  (232 g)  cooked shelled edamame', '½ cup  (48 g)  wakame seaweed salad (optional)', '1   lime, juiced', '2 Tbsp  (30 mL)  sodium-reduced\xa0soy sauce', '2 tsp  (10 mL)  sesame oil', '2 tsp  (10 mL)  agave syrup', '1 tsp  (3 g)  garlic powder', '1 tsp  (2 g)  onion powder', 'toasted sesame seeds', 'crispy fried onions']
Directions: ['In a medium pot, bring the rice and water to a boil*. Then reduce to a simmer, partially cover with a lid, and cook for 20 minutes.', 'Meanwhile, make the dressing. Add all the ingredients to a jar and mix well.', 'Prep the fruits and veggies.', 'When the rice is cooked, remove the pot from the heat, cover with a lid, and let rest for 5 minutes.', 'Add the rice to some bowls. Top with the fruit and veggies. Add the edamame and wakame salad, and drizzle over the dressing. Garnish and enjoy!']

Title: Golden Glow Sauce
Ingredients: ['¼ cup  (60 mL)  tahini', '3 Tbsp  (45 mL)  water', '1 tsp  (6 g)  miso paste', '1 tsp  (5 mL)  dijon mustard', '½ tsp    ground turmeric', '½   lemon, juiced', '½ tsp    onion powder', '1 pinch    ground black pepper']
Directions: ['Add all the ingredients toa jar and whisk. Serve on salads or nourish bowls and enjoy!']

Title: Autumn Glow Nourish Bowl
Ingredients: ['1 Tbsp  (15 mL)  vegetable oil', '1   medium onion, sliced', '2   cloves garlic, chopped', '3   medium sweet potatoes, cut into 1 cm cubes', '2½ cups   (220 g)  Brussels sprouts, ends trimmed, halved', '1½ cups  (255 g)  uncooked quinoa, rinsed', '2¼ cups  (540 mL)  water', '1   vegetable bouillon cube', '2 cups  (60 g)  fresh spinach', '⅓ cup  (46 g)  roasted unsalted almonds, chopped', '¼ cup  (44 g)  pomegranate seeds', '2 Tbsp  (20 g)  dried cranberries', '¼ cup  (60 mL)  tahini', '⅓ cup  (80 mL)  water', '1 tsp  (6 g)  miso paste', '1 tsp  (5 mL)  dijon mustard', '½ tsp    ground turmeric', '½   lemon, juiced', '½ tsp    onion powder', '1 pinch    ground black pepper']
Directions: ['Preheat the oven to 430°F (220°C). Toss the oil, sweet potatoes, and Brussels sprouts on a lined baking tray.', 'Bake for about 20 minutes. Then toss in the garlic and onion and bake for another 20 minutes.', 'Meanwhile, add the quinoa, water, and bouillon to a saucepan. Cook at a simmer, partially covered for 15 - 20 minutes, or until the liquid is absorbed.', 'Remove from the heat, fluff with a fork, cover, and let rest for an additional 5 - 10 minutes.', 'Add the sauce ingredients to a bowl and whisk until smooth.', 'To a assemble, add the greens, quinoa, and baked veggies to a bowl. Sprinkle on the almonds, pomegranate seeds, and cranberries. Drizzle on the sauce and enjoy!']

Title: Burrito Nourish Bowl with Creamy Guacamole
Ingredients: ['1½ cups  (285 g)  uncooked brown rice, soaked overnight, drained', '2¼ cups  (540 mL)  water', '1   vegetable bouillon cube', '1 Tbsp  (15 mL)  olive oil', '2   medium onions, chopped', '2   cloves garlic, minced', '10   button mushrooms, sliced', '¼ cup  (33 g)  Mexican spice mix', '1   red bell pepper, thinly sliced', '2 cups  (60 g)  fresh spinach, chopped', '1⅔ cups  (400 g)  canned diced tomatoes', '1½ cups  (170 g)  soy veggie ground', '1 cup  (165 g)  canned corn', '⅓ cup  (57 g)  cooked black beans(optional)', '1   avocado', '1   clove garlic, crushed', '2 tsp  (10 mL)  sriracha hot sauce', '½   lime, juiced', '2 Tbsp  (30 mL)  chipotle adobo sauce', '2 Tbsp  (30 mL)  unsweetened soy yogurt']
Directions: ['Add the rice, water, and bouillon to a saucepan.', 'Simmer, partially covered, for 20 minutes*. When cooked, remove from the heat, fully cover, and let rest for a few minutes.', 'Meanwhile, add the oil, onion, and garlic to a sauté pan on high heat. Cook until lightly golden, about 5 minutes.', 'Add the mushrooms and spice mix. Cook until the water released from the mushrooms evaporates, about 8 minutes.', 'Then add the bell pepper, spinach, tomatoes, veggie ground, corn, and beans. Cook for 7 more minutes.', 'Meanwhile, mash the avocado, and mix the guacamole ingredients in a bowl.', 'For the chipotle yogurt sauce, mix the ingredients in a small bowl.', 'To serve, add the rice to a bowl, the mushroom mixture, guacamole, and yogurt sauce. Garnish and enjoy!']

Title: Peanut Butter & Jelly Smoothie Bowl
Ingredients: ['1½ cups  (360 mL)  unsweetened soy milk†', '2   frozen bananas', '1½ cups  (225 g)  frozen strawberries', '3 Tbsp  (45 mL)  peanut butter', 'fresh mixed berries', 'whole chia seeds', 'vegan granola', 'hemp seeds']
Directions: ['Add all of the ingredients to a blender and blend until smooth.', 'Pour into a bowl, add desired toppings, and enjoy!']

Title: Curry Lentil Soup
Ingredients: ['2 tsp  (10 mL)  olive oil', '1   medium onion, diced', '2   cloves garlic, crushed', '1 tsp  (2 g)  curry powder', '1 tsp  (2 g)  paprika powder', '½ tsp    ground coriander', '½ tsp    garam masala', '¼ tsp    ground turmeric', '3   medium potatoes, cut into 1 cm cubes', '1   zucchini, finely chopped', '1   carrot, finely chopped', '1 cup  (192 g)  dry red lentils, soaked in hot water for 10 minutes', '2   vegetable bouillon cubes', '4 cups  (960 mL)  water', '½    lemon, juiced', '1½ cups  (360 mL)  unsweetened soy yogurt', '3   vegan naans']
Directions: ['Add the oil and onion to a large pot on high heat. Cook until golden, about 5 minutes. Add splashes of water as needed to deglaze the pan.', 'Then add garlic and the spices, and cook for another 2 minutes.', 'Add the remaining soup ingredients. Simmer, partially covered, for 15 minutes or until the lentils and potatoes are cooked.', 'Optionally, for a creamier texture, use an immersion blender to purée some of the soup. Then add the lemon juice.', 'Garnish as desired, serve hot and enjoy!']

Title: Vanilla Berry Chia Seed Pudding
Ingredients: ['1 cup  (240 mL)  unsweetened soy milk†', '3 Tbsp  (32 g)  whole chia seeds', '1 Tbsp  (15 mL)  maple syrup', '¼ tsp    pure vanilla extract', '⅛ tsp    ground cinnamon (optional)', '⅓ cup  (50 g)  frozen mixed berries', '¼ cup  (60 mL)  unsweetened soy yogurt', '3 Tbsp   (23 g)  vegan granola', '¼ cup  (38 g)  fresh mixed berries (optional)']
Directions: ['Mix together the chia pudding ingredients in a bowl or cup. Let it sit for 8 minutes.', 'Meanwhile, in a microwave-safe bowl, heat the frozen fruit at 600W for 1 - 2 minutes, or until fully thawed. Alternatively, thaw on the stove. Let it cool, then store away in an airtight container in the fridge until ready to use.', 'Returning to the chia mixture, stir again to redistribute the settled seeds. Then cover and refrigerate overnight to allow the chia seeds to gel.', 'When ready to serve, give it one more stir. Add desired toppings, and enjoy!']

Title: Quinoa & Red Lentil Stuffed Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients: ['4   medium sweet potatoes', '1 tsp  (5 mL)  olive oil', '1   medium onion, chopped', '2   cloves garlic, crushed', '1 tsp  (2 g)  curry powder', '½ tsp    ground cumin', '½ tsp    ground coriander', '½ cup  (96 g)  dry red lentils, rinsed', '½ cup  (85 g)  uncooked quinoa, rinsed', '2 cups  (480 mL)  water', '½   vegetable bouillon cube', '1 tsp  (5 mL)  sambal oelek (optional)', '½   medium broccoli, cut into bite-sized florets', '1   red bell pepper, chopped', '¼ cup  (60 mL)  tahini', '2 Tbsp  (30 mL)  water', '1 Tbsp  (15 mL)  balsamic vinegar', '2 tsp  (10 mL)  sodium-reduced\xa0soy sauce', 'sliced green onion']
Directions: ['Preheat the oven to 400°F (210°C). Pierce each sweet potato 8 - 10 times with a fork in several locations. Transfer to a baking tray. Roast until tender, about 45 - 55 minutes.', 'Add the oil to a large pot on high heat. When hot, add the onions, cooking for 5 minutes. Add splashes of water as needed to de-glaze the pan.', 'Add the garlic and cook for another 2 minutes, stirring often.', 'Then add the curry powder, cumin, and coriander. Stir for 30 - 60 seconds to toast the spices.', 'Then add the lentils, quinoa, water, bouillon cube, and sambal. Bring to a boil, reduce to a simmer, and cook partially covered for 10 minutes.', 'Then add the broccoli and bell pepper. Stir, cover fully with the lid, and cook for 5 minutes.', 'Meanwhile, mix all of the dressing ingredients in a small bowl.', 'When the cooked sweet potatoes are cool enough to handle, slice them lengthwise and gently squeeze open. Use a fork to mash the inside to make room for the fillings on top.', 'Scoop the lentil and quinoa mixture into the "pockets" of the sweet potato. Drizzle the sauce generously over top, and enjoy!']

Title: Raspberry Chocolate Pudding
Ingredients: ['1 cup  (150 g)  frozen raspberries†', '¼ cup  (60 mL)  water', '2   avocados', '6 Tbsp  (40 g)  Dutch processed cocoa powder', '¼ cup  (60 mL)  agave syrup, plus more to taste', '1½ Tbsp  (22 mL)  fresh lemon juice', '2 tsp  (10 mL)  pure vanilla extract', 'dairy-free dark chocolate chips', 'unsweetened coconut flakes']
Directions: ['Add the raspberries and water to a food processor and blend until a sorbet consistency is reached.', 'Add the remaining ingredients and blend until smooth.', "Taste-test. If it's tart, add a bit more syrup. Serve immediately and enjoy!"]

Title: Avocado Garlic Cream
Ingredients: ['2   avocados', '2   cloves garlic', '2 tsp  (10 mL)  sriracha hot sauce', '¼ tsp    onion powder (optional)', '1   lime, juiced', '1 pinch    salt (optional)']
Directions: ['Add all the ingredients to a small food processor* and blend until creamy. Enjoy with nourish bowls, in wraps, in sandwiches, or as a dip!']

Title: Tropical Pineapple Green Juice
Ingredients: ['3 cups  (495 g)  fresh pineapples, chopped', '1   cucumber', '2 cups  (50 g)  kale', '2 Tbsp  (3 g)  fresh basil (optional)']
Directions: ['Add the ingredients to a juicer, alternating between adding bits of pineapples and leaves of kale to extract the maximum amount of juice. Serve immediately and enjoy!']

Title: One-Bowl Soft Vegan Chocolate Chip Cookies
Ingredients: ['½ cup  (109 g)  refined coconut oil, solid, packed†', '⅔ cup  (147 g)  brown sugar, packed', '¼ cup  (60 mL)  unsweetened soy milk', '3 Tbsp  (45 mL)  maple syrup', '1 Tbsp  (15 mL)  pure vanilla extract', '1 tsp  (3 g)  baking powder', '¾ tsp     baking soda', '½ tsp    salt', '2 cups  (276 g)  all-purpose flour', '5.3 oz  (150 g)  dairy-free dark chocolate, chopped']
Directions: ['Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). In a large bowl, cream together the coconut oil* and brown sugar with a fork.', "Then add the milk, maple syrup, vanilla, baking powder, baking soda, and salt and mix until well combined. The mixture might look a bit clumpy, and that's okay.", 'Sift the flour into the bowl and stir until partially combined.', 'Lastly, fold the chopped chocolate through the dough. Be careful to not over-mix.', 'Scoop up 1 Tbsp of the dough at a time, and roll them into balls. Place on a line baking tray about 2 inches (5 cm) apart, as the cookies will spread.', 'To decorate, add a few bits of chopped chocolate to the top of each cookie if desired.', 'Bake on the centre rack of the oven for 12 - 13 minutes, or until lightly golden. Let them set on the baking tray for a minute before transferring to a cooling rack to cool completely. Enjoy!']

Title: Quick-Cooking Millet Breakfast Porridge
Ingredients: ['⅓ cup  (67 g)  uncooked millet, soaked overnight†', '1½ cups  (360 mL)  unsweetened soy milk', '½ tsp    ground cinnamon', '⅛ tsp    pumpkin spice mix (optional)', '1   banana, sliced', '1 Tbsp  (7 g)  ground flaxseeds', '⅓ cup  (50 g)  fresh mixed berries', '1 Tbsp  (9 g)  chopped dairy-free dark chocolate (optional)']
Directions: ['Add the drained millet, milk, and spices to a saucepan. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to a simmer. Cover and cook for 10 minutes.', 'Then add the banana and flaxseeds and cook for an additional 5 minutes. The banana dissolves in the porridge as it cooks, making it naturally sweet and creamy.', 'The millet is ready when soft and chewy to your liking*. Add desired toppings and enjoy!']

Title: Sweet Lime Summer Fruit Salad
Ingredients: ['2 tsp  (10 mL)  agave syrup', '1   lime, zested, juiced', '2   kiwis, sliced', '1   mango, peeled, cubed', '1 cup  (150 g)  fresh blueberries', '1 cup  (150 g)  red grapes', '1 cup  (152 g)  fresh strawberries, quartered', '1 cup  (144 g)  fresh blackberries', '¼ cup  (8 g)  fresh mint leaves, chopped']
Directions: ['In a large bowl, combine the agave syrup, lime zest, and juice.', 'Add the fruit and mint to the bowl and toss with the dressing. Serve immediately. Enjoy!']

Title: Roasted Cauliflower & Potato Wraps
Ingredients: ['3   medium potatoes, cut into 1 cm cubes', '½   medium head cauliflower, broken into bite-sized florets', '1 Tbsp  (15 mL)  vegetable oil', '1 tsp  (3 g)  garlic powder', '1 tsp  (2 g)  onion powder', '½ tsp    paprika powder', '¼ tsp    salt', '⅛ tsp    ground black pepper', '4   large soft tortillas', '1 cup  (246 g)  hummus', '1   avocado, thinly sliced', '½   cucumber, diced', '12   cherry tomatoes, cut in halves', '¼ cup  (34 g)  green olives, chopped (optional)', '2 cups  (60 g)  fresh spinach']
Directions: ['Preheat the oven to 400°F (205°C). Add the potatoes and cauliflower to a lined baking tray*.', 'Drizzle over the oil and toss. Then add the spices and toss again. Roast for 40 - 45 minutes. Stop to stir once halfway.', 'Assemble the wraps by adding in the fillings, followed by the roasted cauliflower and potatoes.', 'Optionally, heat up the wraps on a large pan on high heat until toasted and golden on the outside. Enjoy!']

Title: Nutty Granola Apple Bites
Ingredients: ['2   apples, sliced into wedges', '¼ cup  (60 mL)  hazelnut butter', '¼ cup  (30 g)  vegan granola', '¼ tsp    ground cinnamon', '1.4 oz  (40 g)  dairy-free dark chocolate']
Directions: ['Lightly coat the apple wedges in hazelnut butter, then press the wedges into a plate of granola. Sprinkle cinnamon over the wedges.', 'Melt the chocolate in a microwave at 600W, stirring every 20 seconds until the chocolate is just fully melted. Be careful not to overheat.', 'Drizzle the wedges with melted dark chocolate. Enjoy!']

Title: Candied Sesame Almonds
Ingredients: ['2 Tbsp  (30 mL)  maple syrup', '1 Tbsp  (14 g)  refined coconut oil, melted†', '⅛ tsp    salt', '1 pinch    cayenne pepper (optional)', '2 cups  (286 g)  raw almonds', '2 Tbsp  (16 g)  raw sesame seeds']
Directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C). In a medium bowl, mix together the maple syrup, coconut oil, salt, and cayenne.', 'Then add in the nuts and toss to coat. Transfer to a parchment-lined baking tray, and roast on the middle rack of the oven for 5 minutes.', 'Then remove from the oven, add the sesame seeds, toss to coat, and roast for another 5 - 7 minutes, or until lightly golden. The nuts continue to cook a little after being taken out of the oven and the mixture may still look wet but it will harden as it cools. Enjoy!']

Title: Protein-Packed Vegan Stuffed Bell Peppers
Ingredients: ['⅔ cup  (133 g)  dry split mung beans', '⅔ cup  (67 g)  uncooked quick-cooking brown rice', '1   medium onion', '3   cloves garlic', '½ cup  (68 g)  green olives', '6   bell peppers', '½ Tbsp  (7 mL)  olive oil', '1 tsp  (2 g)  ground cumin', '1 tsp  (1 g)  Italian spice mix', '½ tsp    ground turmeric', '⅛ tsp    salt', '1 pinch    ground black pepper', '1½ cups  (170 g)  soy veggie ground', '1½ cups  (396 g)  tomato-based pasta sauce', '1   avocado, thinly sliced', 'fresh basil', 'toasted, seasoned breadcrumbs']
Directions: ['Cook the mung beans and rice according to the package instructions. For us, it took roughly 30 minutes*. When cooked, drain.', 'While the beans and rice are cooking, chop the onions, mince the garlic, and slice the olives.', "Cut the bell peppers in half lengthwise and discard the seeds. Don't remove the stem, as it helps to hold the filling in place. Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C).", 'Add the oil and onions to a large pan on medium-high heat. Cook until lightly golden.', 'Then add the garlic and spices. Cook for another 1 - 2 minutes, stirring throughout.', 'Then add the veggie ground, pasta sauce, olive, and cooked mung beans and rice. Stir to combine.', 'Divide the filling between the bell pepper halves. Bake uncovered on the middle rack of the oven for 35 - 40 minutes, or until the bell peppers are cooked to your liking.', 'Serve with avocado slices. Enjoy!']

Title: One-Bowl Blueberry Almond Breakfast Cookies
Ingredients: ['1   ripe banana', '1¼ cups  (128 g)  rolled oats', '½ cup  (48 g)  almond flour', '¼ cup  (60 mL)  unsweetened applesauce', '3 Tbsp  (21 g)  ground flaxseeds', '2 Tbsp  (30 mL)  almond butter', '1 Tbsp  (10 g)  whole chia seeds', '1 tsp  (5 mL)  pure vanilla extract', '2 Tbsp  (18 g)  raw pumpkin seeds (optional)', '½ tsp    baking soda', '½ tsp    ground cinnamon', '¼ tsp    salt', '½ cup  (75 g)  fresh blueberries', '1.4 oz  (40 g)  dairy-free dark chocolate, chopped']
Directions: ['Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). Add the banana to a large bowl and mash well.', 'Then add the remaining ingredients, except for the blueberries and chocolate. Mix well.', 'Finally, gently fold in the blueberries and chocolate.', "Form small balls out of the dough and place them on a lined baking tray. Gently press down each ball to create a cookie shape, as these cookies won't spread. Top with some more chocolate, if desired.", 'Bake on the centre rack of the oven for 13 - 15 minutes, or until lightly golden. Let cool completely on a cooling rack. Enjoy!']

Title: Glowing Green Juice
Ingredients: ['3 cups  (75 g)  kale', '1   orange, peeled', '1   apple', '¾   cucumber', '1   lime, peeled', '1 Tbsp  (6 g)  fresh ginger']
Directions: ['Cut and place all of the ingredients in a juicer capable of juicing greens. Serve while fresh. Enjoy!']

Title: Mushroom & Lentil Tacos with Garlic Avocado Cream
